name: B-Raid!
overview: B-Raid! is a vertical scrolling shooter for 1 or 2 players (co-op) developed by Al Dukes using Chris Yates' Shoot 'em Up Construction Kit. It was published by Argus Specialist Publications Ltd. in the following: - Commodore Disk User 1989/11 - Your Commodore 1991/07 (Tape #19)
